entry.title: new bitcoin.org clients page
entry.summary: A Github pull request has been created for the Bitcoin.org website. The pull request, located at https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin.org/pull/34, suggests several changes to the website. These changes aim to improve the website's usability and accessibility, particularly for new users who are not familiar with Bitcoin.The proposed changes include adding a "Getting Started" section to the home page, which would provide links to resources for people who are new to Bitcoin. Additionally, the pull request suggests adding more information about wallets and security to the home page, as well as making it easier to find information about Bitcoin mining.The pull request also recommends updating the website's footer to include links to other Bitcoin-related websites, such as the Bitcoin Wiki and Bitcoin Forum. This would make it easier for users to find additional resources and connect with the wider Bitcoin community.Overall, the suggested changes in the pull request aim to make the Bitcoin.org website more user-friendly and accessible for both new and experienced Bitcoin users. These changes could help to attract more people to Bitcoin and increase its adoption rate.
